title: In case of Government/Semi-Government Department and Organizations/Public Sector Authorities/Underta
clause_text: In case of Government/Semi-Government Department and Organizations/Public Sector Authorities/Undertakings such as the Atomic Energy Department, the Civil Aviation Department, International Airport Authority of India, Defence authorities, Railway authorities and the Mumbai Port Trust, for computing the available FSI, the area of lands not Existing Amenity/reserved but shown as such in the DP for the following purpose shall be excluded:
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
